summary: For CB orders that fulfilled by 3PF, support 3PF Warehouse Vendors to update the tpf_tracking_status when 3PF warehouse receive the order and complete the outbound of the package
description: For CB orders that fulfilled by 3PF, support 3PF Warehouse Vendors to update the tpf_tracking_status when 3PF warehouse receive the order and complete the outbound of the package. CB orders that fulfilled by 3PF： v2.shop.get_shop_info - shop_fulfillment_flag in {Pure - 3PF Shop,PFF - 3PF Shop,LFF Hybrid Shop} And v2.order.get_order_detail - fulfillment_flag = fulfilled_by_local_seller

query.name: order_sn
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order. Limit 150.

query.name: package_number
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

query.name: pickup
query.description: Required parameter ONLY if GetParameterForInit returns "pickup" or if GetLogisticsInfo returns "pickup" under "info_needed" for the same order. Developer should still include "pickup" field in the call even if "pickup" has empty value.

query.name: address_id
query.description: The identity of address. Retrieved from shopee.logistics.GetAddress.

query.name: pickup_time_id
query.description: The pickup time id. Retrieved from shopee.logistics.GetTimeSlot.

query.name: tracking_number
query.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

query.name: dropoff
query.description: Required parameter ONLY if GetParameterForInit returns "dropoff" or if GetLogisticsInfo returns "dropoff" under "info_needed" for the same order. Developer should still include "dropoff" field in the call even if "dropoff" has empty value. For logistic_id 80003 and 80004, both Regular and JOB shipping methods are supported. If you choose Regular shipping method, please use "tracking_no" to call Init API. If you choose JOB shipping method, please use "sender_real_name" to call Init API. Note that only one of "tracking_no" and "sender_real_name" can be selected.

query.name: branch_id
query.description: The identity of branch. Retrieved from shopee.logistics.GetBranch branch.

query.name: tracking_number
query.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

query.name: non_integrated
query.description: Optional parameter when GetParameterForInit returns "non-integrated" or GetLogisticsInfo returns "non-integrated" under "info_needed".

query.name: tracking_number
query.description: Optional parameter for non-integrated channel order. The tracking number assigned by the shipping carrier for item shipment.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warning
schema.description: Indicate warning message you should take care.

schema.name: order_sn
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

schema.name: package_number
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

schema.name: order_sn
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

schema.name: package_number
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

schema.name: fail_error
schema.description: Indicate error type if one element hit error.

schema.name: fail_message
schema.description: Indicate error details if one element hit error.
